info.name: Audio labeling with AudioSet
info.description: Label any audio samples (multiple labels per sample) using a model trained on AudioSet. Make sure you only use AudioSet labels (https://research.google.com/audioset/dataset/index.html).

parameters.name: Hugging Face API Key
parameters.help: An API Key that gives access to Hugging Face

parameters.name: Labels of interest
parameters.help: List of labels from "AudioSet" dataset (separated by ",") that should be labeled.
parameters.placeholder: List of labels from "AudioSet" dataset (separated by ",") that should be labeled.
parameters.hint: Separate labels by a ','. Valid label list: https://research.google.com/audioset/dataset/index.html

parameters.name: Other label
parameters.help: The label to use for data that was not in 'Labels of interest'.

parameters.name: Window size (ms)
parameters.help: Size of the window for each classification.

parameters.name: Minimum confidence threshold
parameters.help: Any classifications with a confidence below this threshold are marked 'other'
